summary: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement detains tens of thousands of noncitizens each year in facilities nationwide. This Snapshot highlights our previous work and actions that ICE can take to ensure that these facilities are safe, humane, and well-managed. For example, ICE could: fully analyze its facility inspections data to identify broad issues and trends improve oversight of detention conditions ensure that detained noncitizens consent to...
title: Immigration Detention: ICE Can Improve Oversight and Management
